Posts.EditableText:
I am using this on my Ipad, in Google Docs web browser, if that changes anything.

I cannot preview it. I do not even get an error message, all I see is a blank screen. Does anyone know how to fix this? 

If the answer is obvious I’m sorry, I don’t know anything about technology, I’m just here to write little stories.
